SELECT id AS id ,ponds_id AS pondsId ,terminal_id AS terminalId ,code AS code ,unit AS unit ,name AS name ,create_date AS createDate ,user_id AS userId ,is_alarm AS isAlarm FROM sensor
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT id AS id ,ponds_id AS pondsId ,terminal_id AS terminalId ,code AS code ,unit AS unit ,name AS name ,create_date AS createDate ,user_id AS userId FROM sensor WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT a.id , a.ponds_id pondsId , a.terminal_id terminalId , a.`code` , a.unit , a.`name` , a.create_date createDate , b. NAME deviceName FROM sensor a , device b WHERE a.terminal_id = b.terminal_id AND a.ponds_id = #{pondsId} AND a.is_enable = 'y'

SELECT a.id , a.ponds_id pondsId , a.terminal_id terminalId , a.`code` , a.`name` , a.is_alarm isAlarm, a.create_date createDate, b.unit, b.upper, b.lower, b.remark FROM sensor a LEFT JOIN sensor_warn_config b ON a.`code` = b.`code` WHERE a.ponds_id = #{pondsId}

SELECT DISTINCT a.*, IF(b.ponds_id > 0,'y', 'n') isEnable FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM sys_dict WHERE group_id IN( SELECT dict_group_id FROM sys_dict_group WHERE group_code IN( SELECT `code` FROM sys_dict a , sys_dict_group b WHERE a.group_id = b.dict_group_id AND b.group_code = 'CGQ' ) ) ) a WHERE CODE NOT IN( SELECT a.`code` FROM sensor a WHERE a.terminal_id = #{terminalId} AND a.ponds_id != #{pondsId} ) ) a LEFT JOIN(SELECT `code`, ponds_id FROM sensor WHERE ponds_id = #{pondsId}) b ON a. CODE = b. CODE;

SELECT a.id , a.ponds_id pondsId , a.terminal_id terminalId , a.`code` , a.unit , a.`name` , a.create_date createDate , b.`name` pondsName, b.address FROM sensor a , ponds b WHERE a.ponds_id = b.id AND a.terminal_id = #{terminalId}

SELECT a.code, a.name, b.id, b.pondsId,b.isEnable FROM ( SELECT a.* FROM sys_dict a , sys_dict_group b WHERE a.group_id = b.dict_group_id AND b.group_code = #{groupCode} ) a LEFT JOIN( SELECT code, id, ponds_id pondsId, is_enable isEnable FROM sensor WHERE terminal_id = #{terminalId} ) b ON a. CODE = b.`code`;

SELECT a.code, a.name, b.id, b.pondsId, b.isEnable FROM ( SELECT * FROM sys_dict WHERE group_id in ( SELECT dict_group_id FROM sys_dict_group WHERE group_code in ( SELECT `code` FROM sys_dict a, sys_dict_group b WHERE a.group_id = b.dict_group_id AND b.group_code = #{groupCode}) ) ) a LEFT JOIN( SELECT code, id, ponds_id pondsId, is_enable isEnable FROM sensor WHERE terminal_id = #{terminalId} ) b ON a. CODE = b.`code`;
